channel.title: Automatically removed quote of whole previous post.
channel.description: @Patrick can you check why the system removing my quotations on the above comment? (check the history you will find how its written and how the system removing it)

item.title: Automatically removed quote of whole previous post.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Strange feature indeed.

The quote you wanted to make was a reasonable one. Just 1 line. But the forum saw it as ‚Äúwhole post‚Äù. Whole post quote is bad if a very long post but for short ones very much ok.

Discourse Meta ‚Äì 7 Jan 19

What is the ‚ÄúAutomatically removed quote of whole previous post‚Äù system edit?

In the notification list, I see Pencil System (topic thread name) The edit history says system 1 hour ‚Äî Automatically removed quote of whole previous post. Jim7: . .The last item on his post looks like the user made ‚Äúwhiskers‚Äù from keyboard...

Reading time: 2 mins üïë Likes: 10 ‚ù§

Feature disabled.

Read full topic
item.source: Automatically removed quote of whole previous post.
